casebody.data:
Terry DAVIS
v.
LOUISIANA DELTA COMMUNITY COLLEGE FOUNDATION, the Foundation for Louisiana's Community and Technical College, Greg Groves, Jay Russell, Sheriff, Ouachita Parish, Louisiana, Chris Jerkins, Ricky Bacle, Rick Shaw, Lee Harrell, Sheriff, Richland Parish, Louisiana, B.J. Martien, City of West Monroe, Matt Downhour and Glen Springfield NO. 2018-CC-0305 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 6, 2018

Denied.
